Claude automatically invokes relevant skills based on your task—no manual selection needed. You'll even see skills in Claude's chain of thought as it works.Claude 会根据您的任务自动调用相关技能——无需手动选择。您甚至能在 Claude 的思考过程中看到它使用的技能。

Creating skills is simple. The "skill-creator" skill provides interactive guidance: Claude asks about your workflow, generates the folder structure, formats the SKILL.md file, and bundles the resources you need. No manual file editing required.创建技能非常简单。"skill-creator"技能提供交互式引导：Claude 会询问您的工作流程，自动生成文件夹结构、格式化 SKILL.md 文件，并打包所需资源。整个过程无需手动编辑文件。
